uid.description: Unique identifier of the dashboardWidget object

app_code_name.description: The code name of the app that owns the widget

display_name.description: The widget display name in different languages

permissions.description: The permissions required for the widget to show up for a staff member

module.description: The module (FF) requeired for the widget to show up for a staff member

component_data.description: a configuration object that is passed to the widget to initialize it. Can vary based on the widget class

dimensions.description: The dimensions of the widget in grid units

min_width.description: the minimum width of the widget in grid units

min_height.description: the minimum height of the widget in grid units

height.description: the default height of the widget

width.description: the default width of the widget

max_width.description: the maximum width of the widget in grid units

max_height.description: the maximum height of the widget in grid units

created_at.description: The time the staffWidgetsBoard was created

updated_at.description: The time the staffWidgetsBoard was last updated

description: A widget that can be added to the dashboard to display information or functionality
